Text: Mazatec, Muchas Gracias de Moscu por esta pelicula muy importante de Mikhail Kalatozov! ¿Acaso no tienes tambien Que Viva Mexico de Sergei Eisenstein?
I can't believe that this full DVD does only contain 1 sub/idiomas... No french at all ? No russian ?

Artleo: Nada que agradecer ;-) Y sí, sí tengo Que Viva México; la pondré en cuanto este torrent esté más maduro.

roma_barca: Here's how the languages go: original soundtrack in Spanish (with some English), over-dubbed in Russian, subtitles in English ONLY.... Yes, I am surprised too.

thank you Mazatec for your answer. Sometimes people don't look at their torrent and forget to answer to comment/question. THANK YOU ONCE AGAIN, MASTERWORK, even if i Que Viva Mexico ! completed would have been unbeatable ;-)
Classic movie. Just like Que Viva Mexico, highly recommended. You don't get overviews of a nation like these two films. And no wonder it's Marxist.
thank you very much Mazatec. Great movie
does it come with english subtitles?
